Topic.Title: Killing Hitler With Praise And Fire Kickstarter

Posts.EditableText:
Just launched my first gamebook Killing Hitler With Praise and Fire on kickstarter, so if anyone here likes gamebooks and Hitler they'll probably like my book, it's pretty funny, though I do try to keep everything historically accurate.

[url:15e48k8q]http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/376100657/killing-hitler-with-praise-an-fire-choose-your-own[/url:15e48k8q]

Posts.EditableText: I don't think you need funds to create a gamebook, especially on this site, but that's just me.
